title: Open Source Licensing Tips for Indie Hackers
description: Discover essential open source licensing tips for indie hackers to innovate effectively and legally. Learn about key licenses, align goals with licensing, manage dependencies, and strategies for commercialization and community building.
keywords: open source licensing, indie hackers, MIT License, GPL, Apache License, BSD License, software development, open source tools, project goals, community engagement, commercialization, legal advice
